mapper.select: SELECT `user`.id AS userId, `user`.username, `user`.role, `user`.phone_number, `user`.`status`, `user`.create_time, `user`.update_time, user_info.nickname, user_info.avatar_url, user_info.`name`, user_info.gender, user_info.school, user_info.education, user_info.identity_no, user_info.birthday FROM `user` LEFT JOIN user_info ON `user`.id = user_info.user_id WHERE user_info.`name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') ORDER BY `user`.create_time DESC
